items.sentence: Tom wouldn\'t have done that if we hadn\'t asked him to.
They couldn\'t catch up with him because he ran so fast.
I just got a letter from someone I knew a long time ago.
I don\'t really feel like eating Ethiopian food tonight.
I don\'t think anyone has lived in this house for years.
Tom realized that he wasn\'t the same as the other kids.
Tom is the one who told me why I needed to go to Boston.
Tom\'s shoes were so tight he couldn\'t wiggle his toes.
Would you be willing to send me a sample free of charge?
You should always wash new garments before wearing them.
